title: Plasmo
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television programs for children

Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television programs - Australia
Mathematics, Science & Technology/Life on other planets
description: Plasmo, Parsty and Nik Nik are stuck on the planet Pynco, desperate to return home, when they come across two explorers, Brucho and Coredor. This tape includes seven adventures previously screened on ABC television. Episodes include: PLASMO AND THE MOONTOWER, PLASMO BLASTS OFF, PLASMO IN DEEP SPACE, PLASMO ARRIVES, TOUR OF MONJOTROLDECLIPDOC, PLASMO AND THE SPACE GHOSTS, PLASMO AND THE BOOKWORM. The magic of puppetry and animation used to create Plasmo's world will delight children everywhere. Voices provided by Abbe Holmes, Pia Morley and Phil Houghton.
